rules_text:
When this creature enters, create a Shard token. [i](It's an enchantment with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Scry 1, then draw a card.”)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, target noncreature, nonland permanent you control becomes a 3/3 Shapeshifter creature with changeling in addition to its other types. [i](This card is every creature type.)[/i]
